sentences.sContent: Jack and Kim celebrated their twentieth wedding anniversary in January.
sentences.sCn: 1月，杰克和金庆祝了他们的结婚20周年纪念日。

phrases.pCn: 结婚纪念日；结婚周年纪念日

remMethod.val: anni(年)+vers(转)+ary→每年都会转到的日子→周年纪念

trans.tranOther: a date on which something special or important happened in a previous year
